title: To Enjoy 'Exodus,' Don't Take It As Seriously As It Takes Itself
teaser: Director Ridley Scott's take on the story of Moses is half solemn, half silly â€” and not so far an evolution from Charlton Heston's The Ten Commandments as it would like to believe.
